COUNTRY
USA Canada

Electronic Integration

ECOMMERCESTRATEGY

Experience matters. With over 40 years combined in the promotional product industry plus 20 in eCommerce you can feel confident about partnering with the PCNA eCommerce Strategy Team. All that experience translates to unique expertise - expertise we share through a consultative approach, providing tools and information to drive your eCommerce business. Maybe its brainstorming an online marketing campaign, delivering customer merchandising opportunities, or digging into data to identify key trends. Whatever you need, were here to help. Want to chat with a member of our Digital Strategy team? Get in touch here and lets get started.

DATA INTEGRATION AND DOWNLOADS

PCNA offers data integration services to meet each customers needs and integration capabilities. Our products include PromoStandards compliant web services, as well as downloadable XML and CSV files. Our Digital Services team focuses on continued creation and enhancement of these offerings, as well as technical support for our customers development teams in order to help them take full advantage of these data products. Want to chat with a member of our Digital Services team? Get in touch here and lets get started.

Get Web Services

Sign Up For PromoStandards Compliant Web Services

PromoStandards are a set of open standards specific to the promotional products industry that allow suppliers and distributors to exchange data electronically, including product information, invoices, and purchase orders.

PCNA not only offers web services that are PromoStandards-compliant, but we are also one of the main contributors that helped to develop these standards. In addition, we have a team devoted to the continued creation of new standards-compliant offerings, enhancement of existing services, and technical support and guidance for our customers attempting to implement web services. Contact us today to learn more about how web services may be a viable way to enhance your customers on-line experience with you, as well as increase efficiencies with your supplier interactions.
